definition: female general/(fig.) woman who is a leading figure in her area of expertise
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: A woman pushes a stroller down the sidewalk in front of us.
sentences.chinese: 我們前面的一位婦女將一名流浪漢推倒在人行道上。

sentences.english: Women with damaged uteruses and wombs will be able to have babies.
sentences.chinese: 子宮受損的婦女將能夠有孩子。

sentences.english: It's what the Chinese women distance runners use to improve their endurance.
sentences.chinese: 中國的長跑女將都是用這個來增強耐力的。

sentences.english: However, who can know, this female general is child bride one's previous experience however.
sentences.chinese: 然而，誰能知道，這位女將軍卻是童養媳出身。

sentences.english: All three of the Owen women were on the plane bound for Brussels. (para. 3)
sentences.chinese: 歐文家的三員女將都在去布魯塞爾的航班上。

sentences.english: Women who broke the rule were thrown from a nearby cliff.
sentences.chinese: 犯禁的婦女將會被從附近的懸崖上扔下去。

sentences.english: According to the Islamic tradition, a woman who dies in childbirth is a martyr.
sentences.chinese: 根據伊斯蘭的傳統，死於分娩的婦女將成爲殉教者。

sentences.english: Daniel, do you know who's the first woman general in Chinese history?
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你知道中國歷史上第一位女將軍是誰嗎？

sentences.english: The tooth fairy then adds the tooth to a special part of her all-white tooth castle in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 仙女將牙齒添加到空中的白色牙齒城堡上。

sentences.english: The sister gave Nurse Edgwood a folder of papers and shut the car door.
sentences.chinese: 修女將一個文件夾交給艾格伍德護士，關上車門。

sentences.english: The first female general Li Zhen died.
sentences.chinese: 新中國第一位女將軍李貞逝世。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith, together with his wife and daughter, is going to visit our school next week.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生攜妻女將於下週來我校參觀。

sentences.english: Who in the first recorded female general in Chinese history?
sentences.chinese: 在中國歷史上有文字記載的第一位女將軍是誰？

sentences.english: All three of the Owen women were on the plane bound for Brussels.
sentences.chinese: 歐文家的三員女將都在飛往布魯塞爾的航班上。

sentences.english: If it is found early, nearly 90 percent of women survive.
sentences.chinese: 如果早期發現，近九成的婦女將會倖存。

sentences.english: A woman placed flowers at the wall of the Polish embassy in Moscow.
sentences.chinese: 一名婦女將一束花放在波蘭駐莫斯科大使館的牆邊。

definition: (sports) member of the national team/national representative/(medicine, chess etc) one of the most highly skilled practitioners in one's country
bronze medal/bronze plaque bearing a business name or logo etc/CL:枚[mei2]
